title: Handle a Client Complaint about Billing
description: A client has called to complain about the amount of their latest invoice, questioning the time spent on a task.

tasks.description: Retrieve the invoice in question and the detailed time entries associated with it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the bill and the underlying time records.

tasks.description: Review the detailed descriptions for the time entries to understand the work that was performed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the context of the charges.

tasks.description: Explain the value of the work performed to the client and, if authorized by a partner, offer a small courtesy write-off to maintain goodwill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent professionally handles the complaint and resolves the issue.
